item.title: Callout
item.description:
.. |callout| image:: /img/tofu_logo.png

Tofu, file storage made easy <http://tofu.st/>_

|callout| Tofu is a file storage solution based on evonove’s own customers requirements. You can try the service and get 1Gb of disk space for your personal files, for free.

.. raw:: html

<a href="http://tofu.st" target="_blank" class="btn btn-warning"><i class="icon-shopping-cart"></i>Get an account now</a>

item.title: Home
item.description:
Say Hello to Evonove!

IT consulting for small and medium enterprises.

We help our customers to build quality IT systems by designing and developing software, planning and managing infrastructures, training. We try to actively involve our customers in every step when delivering a project, from the design of the application to the final test. Companies with their own technical staff can temporarily hire part of our staff when specific know-how is needed during the development of a project.
